SENT.plain: We are reporting a young lady with protracted deep vein thrombosis of her left leg which turned out to be antiphospholipid (anticardiolipin) antibody syndrome of ANA positive systemic lupus erythematosus
Lupus anticoagulant was demonstrated by prolongation of activated partial thromboplastin time and Russell's viper venom time
She had no anti-thrombin III deficiency
